section.title: Element: Number
section.simpara: A number is some literal numeric value.

formalpara.title: Number contents
formalpara.para: The content of a number element is empty.

formalpara.title: Number attributes
formalpara.para:
The value attribute should contain the literal syntax of the number. The class attribute should indicate the general type of the number, from among the following:
int float complex big .
